mapper.insert: INSERT INTO message (message_id, message_create_date, message_text, message_room_id, message_read, user_id) VALUES (MESSAGE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{message_create_date}, #{message_text}, #{message_room_id}, 0, #{user_id})
mapper.select: SELECT message_id, message_create_date, message_text, message_room_id, message_read, user_id FROM message WHERE message_room_id = #{roomId} ORDER BY message_create_date ASC
